> <OLD>
>
> "They saw us"said Windlord
>
> "Let's wait what they do"muttered Perceptor

<NEW>

The proto-human looked around and sniffed the air his sensors keenly
alert. He narrowed his eyes as he turned.

Then one of the robed figures came up behind the first, placed a hand
on his shoulder and whispered something in his ear.

Interestingly, for a moment, as the robed male had touched the other,
a part of his arm was exposed and it was covered with strange marks -
radiation burns!

After a moment the first figure nodded and then they both began to
walk into the forest again, leaving the statue and the MAXIMALS
behind.

(TAG)

- Preston
